channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m 80. Is this a good or bad time to dip into my $650K retirement fund to remodel my bathroom?
item.description: “The economic and political climate makes me reluctant to do so.”

item.title: Why BlackRock may not need to pay a big premium for a $38 billion energy acquisition

item.title: ‘I don’t come from money’: I received $1.2 million after a family tragedy. My low money-market interest rate is ending. What now?
item.description: “Having a large sum just sitting there freaks me out.”

item.title: Why the S&P 500’s path to 7,000 is alive and well, according to trader who nailed summer call for stocks to climb
item.description: Wobbles by the S&P 500 near fresh highs has caused skittish behavior by Wall Street’s smart money recently. That will help smooth a path to 7,000, say...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
